item.title: HMY
item.description: score:-28 Chances: Gold prices have surged recently and are trading at near all-time highs. Risks: The rally that catapulted U.S. equities to newer and higher valuations seems to have come to an end. Score:-28 chances characters count - risks characters count = -28
